name: GodFinger 2
description:
Be the best god ever! Create a perfect, happy world for your followers in the new sequel to the #1 mobile god game. Can you attract all the followers?

PLUS! Now includes the original GodFinger 1 All-Stars game! Build the Time Portal to transport your world back to the classic gameplay loved by all

  • Create a perfect beautiful world to attract followers and keep them happy.
  • The more followers you attract, the more powerful you become. Each follower has their own special abilities to help you craft the perfect world - can you collect them all?
  • Use touch to draw the planet shape you want using the incredible Terraform powers!
  • Entertain your followers by using your powers: soak them with rain, strike them with lightning or toast them with fire!
  • Tactile powers of Lightning, Rain, and Fire make you a mighty god!
  • Grow crops and craft goods to answer your follower's prayers and win their belief
  • Zoom in to enjoy the vector animations at close range.
  • Full retina resolution, beautifully high quality graphics, and fully playable on all iOS9, 10 and 11 devices
  • Play anywhere - no network connection required!
  • Pick up and play for a few minutes of hours at a time spreading joy amongst your world.
  • New quests every day to challenge your powers.
  • 3D Touch gives you precise power control when you need it most
  • GodFinger Classic mode for original gameplay fans!
  • Brand new game engine generates unique procedural worlds for every player
